sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: STRUMPFIA, in botany ; a genus of plants belonging to the claſs of s yngynesia, and to the order of monogamia. The calyx is quinquedentate and iuperior ; the corolla is pentapetalous ; and the berry monoſpermous. There is only one ſpecies, the maritima.
